cast.overview: French secret service agent Josselin Beaumont is dispatched to take down African warlord N'Jala. But when his assignment is canceled, he's shocked to learn that his government is surrendering him to local authorities. He is given a mock trial and sentenced to 20 years of hard labor. But Beaumont escapes from prison and vows not only to avenge himself against his betrayers but also to finish his original assignment.
cast.title: The Professional

cast.overview: When 43-year-old hairdresser Suze Trappet finds out that she's seriously ill, she decides to go looking for a child she was forced to abandon when she was only 15. On her madcap bureaucratic quest she crosses paths with JB, a 50-year-old man in the middle of a burnout, and Mr. Blin, a blind archivist prone to overenthusiasm. The unlikely trio set off on a hilarious and poignant helterskelter journey across the city in search of Suze's long-lost child.
cast.title: Bye Bye Morons

details.biography:
Yves Pignot (born 31 March 1946) is a French actor. He appeared in more than one hundred films since 1969.

Source: Article "Yves Pignot" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Yves Pignot
